name: Critical Kush
description: Critical Kush from Barneyâ€™s Farm is a mostly indica strain that blends together two famed cannabis staples, Critical Mass and OG Kush. Aromatic notes of earthiness and spice usher in a calming sensation that relaxes the mind and body. Critical Kush pairs a staggeringly high THC content with a moderate dose of CBD, making this strain a perfect nighttime medication for pain, stress, insomnia, and muscle spasms. Growers cultivating this strain indoors will wait 50 to 60 days for Critical Kush to complete its flowering cycle.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Euphoric, Sleepy, Hungry, Depression, Stress, Pain, Lack of Appetite, Insomnia, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Anxious, Paranoid
